A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved this movie and so did my whole family.  Just like many critics though\, I think the middle of the movie was a little dull.  It was one of those movies that in certain parts felt like it was oversaturated with messages and too many characters. The original trilogy had a little more focus and I think that's what people loved. You really felt like you got to know the characters.\n\nI honestly thought this movie felt a little bit more like the original trilogy than TFA though which is a big compliment.
